docblock.description: use this class to generate tokens used for a variety of security purposes.
docblock.long-description: Uses a cryptographic random function and a configurable alphabet to maximize entropy.

docblock.description: Generates random bytes from a CSPRNG
creates a token from the given alphabet.
Generates alpha-numeric token
generates salt for use with crypt() blowfish algorithm.
Token generated with even more printable characters
For those that simply must have a hex token.

tag.name: param
tag.description: must be Even number, if not even, will round down.

tag.name: param
tag.description: int Maximum Length of password, optional, if left out it will be the same as $minLen

docblock.description: hashes a password
Checks entered password matches the hash

tag.name: param
tag.description: string password that the user supplied

tag.name: param
tag.description: string hash from storage (eg. from your database)

tag.name: return
tag.description: whether or not the password matched or not

docblock.description: overrides default cost of the hash, will randomize between min and max.

docblock.description: Takes a string and randomly capitilizes letters
Takes a string and capitilizes every other word

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether to start capitilizing even or odd characters.

docblock.description: Takes a string and replaces certain letters with numbers

tag.name: param
tag.description: Some letter replacement depends on case, set to true to make it case insensitive

docblock.description: Takes a string and replaces certain letters with special chars.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Some letter replacement depends on case, set to true to make it case insensitive

docblock.description: Takes a string and replaces certain letters with either numbers or special chars.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Some letter replacement depends on case, set to true to make it case insensitive

docblock.description: Calculates password strength by calculating entropy uses formula length * log(alphabetsize, 2);

tag.name: param
tag.description: optionally pass password to calculate entropy

tag.name: param
tag.description: <Optional> used to see if password could be cracked with a simple dictionary lookup

docblock.description: Calculates alphabet size for entropy calculation
Returns the entropy of the password
Returns password score
Returns if the word was found in a dictionary or not.

tag.name: return
tag.description: whether the word was found in a dictionary or not.

docblock.description: Calculates the general strength of the password.
docblock.long-description: matched against the constants: PasswordStrength::VERY_WEAK, PasswordStrength::WEAK, PasswordStrength::FAIR PasswordStrength::STRONG, PasswordStrength::VERY_STRONG

tag.name: return
tag.description: Calculates the general strength of the password.

docblock.description: convenience method to return word representation of password strength "very weak", "weak", "fair", "strong", "very strong"

tag.name: return
tag.description: word used to describe password strength

docblock.description: sets the password
